column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat is amazing! First time coming here and from the moment we walked in
column2: we were welcomed. Everything about this restaurant compliments so well. My server Victor is literally the best server I've ever seen. I sat on the patio and he came out of the door with a big smile on his face and energy that can shift the atmosphere. He was patient
column3: very knowledgeable and already knew what would compliment our food choice. He was also very inviting and just has a comforting spirit about him. I ordered the mushroom + quinoa burger and it was delicious. The taste was balanced very well and the sauces were a good addition. Will be coming back.
